svcproc.title: Cruise Control
svcproc.para: The ECM will control engine speed to maintain a constant road speed with cruise control. Pressing the SET switch when the vehicle is at the desired speed with the CRUISE switch on activates the cruise control. Speed is increased or decreased by pressing ACCEL or CRUISE switches. The cruise control is deactivated by pressing the OFF switch, applying the brake pedal, clutch pedal, or on vehicles equipped with automatic transmissions, by placing the transmission in neutral.
